summary: Completed testing of Game Status and Lifecycle features including Business Status, Runtime Status, Special Game flags, and Auto-Suggestion functionality

minor_bugs.issue: Auto-suggestion for high min bet games may not be working properly
minor_bugs.impact: High min bet games (>$10) should show suggestion warning but may not appear

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay preventing some clicks on special game toggle

design_issues.issue: Status badges may not be properly styled or visible

passed_tests: Game List displays Lifecycle and Runtime Status columns
Game Config Modal opens with Business/Runtime Status dropdowns
Special Game toggle and Special Type dropdown functionality
Business Status update (Active, Suspended, Draft, etc.)
Game toggle functionality for business status
Star icons for special games display
Backend API endpoints for game status updates
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate auto-suggestion logic for high min bet games - the backend logic may need adjustment to properly trigger suggestion warnings for games with min_bet > $10
